SV022.SV022_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal23"/][UE:Meta key="be7683e2181846a0b02fd9d8678db251" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]You are the one who...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]saved me, yes?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="be7683e2181846a0b02fd9d8678db251" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]I should do something to thank you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Yes,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I will give you a present.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="be7683e2181846a0b02fd9d8678db251" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="WaitGladNoVoice"/]How about a...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]"thank you."[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="be7683e2181846a0b02fd9d8678db251" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Wah ha ha![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Who wouldn't be happy just to
have someone thank them.
SV022.SV022_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal23"/][UE:Meta key="438817f03657402f83e881c4d8ee1ced" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladTalk"/]My name is...[etc:Wait frame="30"/] Well,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] it's not worth
mentioning, really.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="438817f03657402f83e881c4d8ee1ced" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]And what is your name? [etc:Wait frame="15"/]Hmm?[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
[Grammar:Cap/][Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="438817f03657402f83e881c4d8ee1ced" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Wah ha ha![etc:Wait frame="15"/] What a fine name that is![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="438817f03657402f83e881c4d8ee1ced" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GladFaceOnly2"/]Well then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] from now on, you and I are
friends, [Replace:ReplaceName Index="PlayerName"/]! [etc:Wait frame="15"/]It is done!
SV022.SV022_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal23"/][UE:Meta key="87046167520442b98f4c57e44e8ab4d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Now, me...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I deal in mirth.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I like to make
people happy.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="87046167520442b98f4c57e44e8ab4d6" Scale="1"/]Are you not happy to have saved me?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="87046167520442b98f4c57e44e8ab4d6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Wah ha ha![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Go on, then![etc:Wait frame="8"/] Smile!
SV022.SV022_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal23"/][UE:Meta key="3cf8fcea898543939179dcf32c09d45a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]On a planet like this,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you could have all the
money in the universe,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it would be
worth less than a normal piece of paper.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3cf8fcea898543939179dcf32c09d45a" Scale="1"/]At least you could use that to blow your
nose.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Or you could make a paper sandwich.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3cf8fcea898543939179dcf32c09d45a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]It would not be nutritious,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but it could be
delicious.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Wah ha ha!
SV022.SV022_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal23"/][UE:Meta key="8dcc4ab01bb749d2a11355e24a4584b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ClapHands"/]Wow![etc:Wait frame="8"/] I am impressed by you.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] More
impressed than I have been for a
very long time.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8dcc4ab01bb749d2a11355e24a4584b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]What have this planet's creatures
done to you? [etc:Wait frame="15"/]I'm so curious.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8dcc4ab01bb749d2a11355e24a4584b0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]You must be a very pure-hearted
individual, I think.
SV022.SV022_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal23"/][UE:Meta key="74f6493149704ed38258e753aa32a9fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The thing with money is whether you have
it or not,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you can always afford a smile.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="74f6493149704ed38258e753aa32a9fc" Scale="1"/]If you have it,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] your lifestyle might be more
comfortable,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but if you do not,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] sometimes
your heart is still richer.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="74f6493149704ed38258e753aa32a9fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]What do you think?
SV022.SV022_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal23"/][UE:Meta key="b4e514751ae74f4da536ad4cf0b5d2af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Neither you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] nor I,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] nor this planet belong
to anybody.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b4e514751ae74f4da536ad4cf0b5d2af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Our smiles though...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Those are what you'd
call community property.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Wah ha ha!
SV022.SV022_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal23"/][UE:Meta key="2068e193b6ec4dc3bf97e1dd41eaf0d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The trick to helping others smile is to be
smiling yourself.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2068e193b6ec4dc3bf97e1dd41eaf0d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Wow,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you know what?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I am truly happy I
came on this tour.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="2068e193b6ec4dc3bf97e1dd41eaf0d7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Because I met you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] of course.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Wah ha ha!
SV022.SV022_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal23"/][UE:Meta key="8f400856a99b4feb98d7d622f0e263b6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If there is a beginning,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there is an end.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
That is what they say,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8f400856a99b4feb98d7d622f0e263b6" Scale="1"/]If there is no end,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then there cannot have
been a beginning either.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Is that right?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8f400856a99b4feb98d7d622f0e263b6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Wah ha ha![etc:Wait frame="15"/] In other words,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] since our
friendship has no end,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] that means you and
I have been friends since before we met.
SV022.SV022_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Normal23"/][UE:Meta key="50739eedc97245e1b18d60e5b8dd58f7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Are you a...[etc:Wait frame="15"/]dog?[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="50739eedc97245e1b18d60e5b8dd58f7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Wah ha ha![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Like I would know!
SV022.SV022_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal23"/][UE:Meta key="1254936b28b74c13946dfb93fddae9da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]Hey,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] talk about going right to the source.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
I have always wondered if dogs can smile.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] smile for real.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1254936b28b74c13946dfb93fddae9da" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Wah ha ha![etc:Wait frame="15"/] Don't look at me like that.
SV022.SV022_Area500_Talk_Outro_T01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Normal23"/][UE:Meta key="bc54ac71577a4a4ea04adc3855d83d09" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="GoodJob"/]Wah ha ha![etc:Wait frame="15"/] What a wonderful smile![System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="bc54ac71577a4a4ea04adc3855d83d09" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]I am not surprised to learn there are more
of me out there though.
